## bootstrap-core package

## Classes

|  Class | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [BootstrapCoreModule](./bootstrap-core.bootstrapcoremodule.md) | Module for bootstrap core components, directives and pipes |
|  [BootstrapPopoverDirective](./bootstrap-core.bootstrappopoverdirective.md) | Directive applies (bootstrap) jQuery popover on all elements which have popover attribute specified. |
|  [BootstrapTooltipDirective](./bootstrap-core.bootstraptooltipdirective.md) | Directive applies (bootstrap) jQuery tooltip on all elements which have tooltip attribute specified. |

|  [DialogComponent](./bootstrap-core.dialogcomponent.md) | Bootstrap modal dialog component |
